content.html:
Sounds good. Although, I don't think using type aliases works with CompositeData. I just tried and got a compilation error saying duplicate base type . We'd have to do something like:

struct Collision1Type
{
  ShapePtrType data;
};
struct Collision2Type
{
  ShapePtrType data;
};
struct Point
{
  VectorType data;
};

using Contact = RequiredData <Collision1Type, Collision2Type, Point>;
